entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
